description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dnk7m","text":"This protocol is to optimized to dissociate and fix Cassiopea xamachana cells for cell sorting and scRNA-seq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oscd","text":"The dissociation by itself results in 53-55% of viable cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b6gj","text":"Cells cannot be sorted without fixative, unless your machine can sort a seawater solution. Any other solution will lyse cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
